citation.article-title: Nitriliruptor alkaliphilus gen. nov., sp. nov., a deep-lineage haloalkaliphilic actinobacterium from soda lakes capable of growth on aliphatic nitriles, and proposal of Nitriliruptoraceae fam. nov. and Nitriliruptorales ord. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Nitriliruptorales (Ni.tri.li.rup.tor.aâ€²les. N.L. masc. n. Nitriliruptor type genus of the order; -ales ending to denote an order; N.L. fem. pl. n. Nitriliruptorales the order of the genus Nitriliruptor).
Description is as for the family Nitriliruptoraceae.
The 16S rRNA gene signature pattern is as that of the family Nitriliruptoraceae.
